author: IGN
description:
Check out 20 minutes of Borderlands 4 gameplay showing off a Vault run, culminating in a serious boss fight – with narration along the way from our previewer, Travis Northup.

#IGN #Gaming #Borderlands4
title: Borderlands 4: 20 Minutes of Vault and Boss Fight Gameplay

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Story Trailer for Borderlands 4, the next installment in the first-person action RPG shooter franchise developed by Gearbox Studios. Players will explore the planet of Kairos filled with secrets to uncover, ever-changing events, and brutal enemies of all types. Embark into the open world as a Vault Hunter alone or with up to 4 players to face off against The Timekeeper, a ruthless tyrant that makes use of cybernetics to keep the people of Kairos in line and under his command. Fight to unite the people and initiate a revolution in a grand looting adventure with Borderlands 4, launching on September 12 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#IGN #Gaming #Borderlands4
title: Borderlands 4 - Official Story Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Gameplay Deep Dive Reveal Trailer for The Blood of Dawnwalker, an open-world dark fantasy action-adventure RPG developed by Rebel Wolves. Players will assume control Coen, a half-human, half-vampire called a Dawnwalker, in the fight to uncover long-dormant secrets and save your family in a 14th-century European setting. Those that walk the shadows return to lay claim to the power and freedom that they discern are rightly theirs for the taking, enabling players to guide the narrative through choice to stand with humanity or those that embody their vampiric nature. Don’t miss the game’s latest trailer to see the visceral third-person action-oriented gameplay with a suite of weapons and abilities, dialogue choices, and more for The Blood of Dawnwalker. The Blood of Dawnwalker is coming in 2026 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#TheBloodOfDawnwalker #Gaming #IGN
title: The Blood of Dawnwalker - Official Gameplay Deep Dive Overview

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Exclusive Anniversary Update Trailer for Dystopika, a sci-fi city-building simulation game developed by Voids Within. Players can now access a new update for the game, celebrating the anniversary of the release of Dystopika, that's packed with new buildings, props, weather systems, and other content for fans to enjoy. The Dystopika Anniversary Update is also fitted with a new soundtrack created by Sascha Dikiciyan - the composer behind Deus Ex: Mankind Divided, Quake 2, Mass Effect 3, and more. The Anniversary Update for Dystopika is available now for PC (Steam).

#IGN #Gaming
title: Dystopika - Exclusive Anniversary Update Launch Trailer  (Cyberpunk City-Builder)

author: IGN
description:
Luck will always be a factor in Mario Kart World, and while skill will help to a degree, the real difference maker in mitigating luck's impact on a race is track knowledge. So for those looking for the best ways to cut corners and impress your friends, here are a handful of shortcuts and pro tips for all 30 tracks in Mario Kart World.

00:00 - Intro  
00:49 - Desert Hills  
01:33 - Wario Stadium  
02:16 - Whistlestop Summit

04:36 - DK Spaceport  
05:07 - Airship Fortress  
05:41 - Koopa Troopa Beach  
06:14 - Toad's Factory  
07:09 - Dino Dino Jungle  
07:36 - Dry Bones Burnout  
08:24 - Great ? Black Ruins  
10:37 - DK Pass  
11:11 - Peach Beach

17:57 - Wario's Shipyard  
18:47 - Salty Salty Speedway  
19:59 - Acorn Heights  
20:52 - Faraway Oasis  
21:33 - S
title: Mario Kart World - Shortcuts and Pro Tips For Every Track
